name: chr
description: Interpreter for Constraint Handling Rules (CHR) in JavaScript

scripts.prepublish: npm run peg && npm run dist
scripts.browserify-wo-parser: NODE_ENV=browserWithoutParser browserify -t envify -t uglifyify -t browserify-versionify -s CHR src/index.js | uglifyjs > ./dist/chr-wop.min.js
scripts.browserify-full: NODE_ENV=browser browserify -t envify -t uglifyify -t browserify-versionify -s CHR src/index.js | uglifyjs > ./dist/chr.min.js
scripts.browserify: npm run browserify-parser && npm run browserify-wo-parser && npm run browserify-full
scripts.browserify-nonminified: browserify -s chrparser src/parser.js > ./dist/chrparser.js && NODE_ENV=browser browserify -t envify -t browserify-versionify -s CHR src/index.js > ./dist/chr.js
scripts.dist: npm run browserify && npm run browserify-nonminified
scripts.pretest: npm run peg && npm run browserify
scripts.test: npm run standard && npm run tape

author: Falco Nogatz <fnogatz@gmail.com>
